hisSection.no-data: このパートナーのスキルデータはないです。

mySection.intro: 5★ companion’s [MC] has her own special weapon. You can always switch to standard weapons but you can’t wield other companion's exclusive weapon.
mySection.no-data: このパートナーのスキルデータはないです。
mySection.not_limited_companion_warning: No exlusive weapons are available for standard companions. You can only use Standard Hunter series.

skill_NB.resonance_skill: Only that skill helps you to  destroy enemy’s shields. On full Stellactrum Match destroys 2 layers of the shield.
skill_NB.ardent_oath: Usually you can use it once during a battle, use [Oath Recovery Boost] protocore to utilize it twice.

support_skill.name: Scarlet Shade
support_skill.description: Rafayel creates a Scarlet Shade dealing [AoE] DMG and and inflicting Burn. Also leaves 3 [Flame Lilies].

resonance_skill.name: Scorching
resonance_skill.description: You ignite all [Flame Lilies] dealing [AoE] DMG and inflicting Burn. Each of [Flame Lilies] increases your ATK by 5% for 8s.

ardent_oath.name: Searing Motif
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Flowing Flame
passive_skill.description: When you and Rafayel's skills hit enemy, he summons up to 5 [Flame Lilies] dealing [AoE] DMG. When 10 [Flame Lilies] are utilized, Rafayel's [Basic Attack] DMG and attack range are increased.

support_skill.name: Swirling Colors
support_skill.description: Rafayel forces the enemy into the air and kicks them to the ground. Inflicts up to 2 stacks of [Tinctus].

resonance_skill.name: Illuminating Strength
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel perform a series of attacks.

ardent_oath.name: Dazzling Kaleidoscope
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Gilded Tinctus
passive_skill.description: Hitting enemies with [Tinctus] by [Active Skill], [Resonance Skill] or [Ardent Oath] will deal DMG to enemies and restore you and him HP. When 5 stacks are detonated, the enemy's DEF will be reduced by 20% for 5s.

support_skill.name: Aria
support_skill.description: Rafayel thrusts forward, dealing [AoE] DMG and reducing enemy's movement speed by 30% for 5s. It leaves behind [Reprise], it deals bigger DMG and reduces enemy's movement speed by 50% for 5s.

resonance_skill.name: Concerto
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel deal ATK DMG. If enemy inflicted by [Echo], they recieve additional ATK DMG.

ardent_oath.name: Sonata of Reunions
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Recitativo
passive_skill.description: When you and Rafayel deal DMG, you will sing Harmony, next time you use [Aria] it will leave [Echo] behind for 5s. It increases the DMG enemies take and additionally they lose HP based on Rafayeal ATK per second.

support_skill.name: Eclipse Rend
support_skill.description: Click Rafayel's icon when ready, or trigger with [Perfect Dodge]. Leaves [Fishtail Beacon] on a ground restoring 2 Potential on pick • At max [Potential], becomes empowered and Burns enemies

resonance_skill.name: Fantasia Shark
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel pull in enemies with chains. Fantasia Shark bites and burns them after.

ardent_oath.name: Four Scourges
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do massive DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Abyssal Beacon
passive_skill.description: Periodically Rafayel applies [Beacon] on enemies. Hit it with Charged Attack to collect 1 [Potential].

basic_attack.name: Abyssal Rapid Fire
basic_attack.description: Wield dual guns for a combo up to 5 hits. Charged Attack will knock back nearby enemies.

my_passive_skill.name: Abyssal Shadow
my_passive_skill.description: Combo Attack provide buffs on each hit up to 5 stacks. 1 stack increases ATK Speed by 4% and CRIT Rate by 2%.

active_skill.name: Oceanic Traversal
active_skill.description: You perform one big DMG shot from your guns.

support_skill.name: 精霊を喚ぶ潮
support_skill.description: [Sea Spirit]を1体召喚する。強化版「精霊を喚ぶ潮・強化」は[Faith]を10%回復し、[Sea Spirit]の与ダメージを10%増加させる。

resonance_skill.name: 押し寄せる波
resonance_skill.description: ホムラと共に波を召喚し、自身の攻撃力と最大HPに基づくダメージを与える。

ardent_oath.name: 四海の生命
ardent_oath.description: ホムラと共にクジラを召喚し、自身の攻撃力と最大HPに基づく大ダメージを与える。

passive_skill.name: 激流
passive_skill.description: 自身、ホムラ、[Sea Spirits]の攻撃が命中するたびに[Faith]を回復する。[Faith]が満タンになると[Heavenly Rain]を発動し、味方の与ダメージを30%増加させ、全ての[Sea Spirits]のレベルを1上昇させる。

basic_attack.name: うねり
basic_attack.description: 自身の攻撃力と最大HPに基づく最大4段の連続攻撃。重撃は敵を吹き飛ばす。

my_passive_skill.name: 海の低吟
my_passive_skill.description: [Active Skill]を使用すると、[Sea Spirit]を1体召喚する。

active_skill.name: 潮汐
active_skill.description: 近くの敵をノックバックし、自身の攻撃力と最大HPに基づくダメージを与え、[Tidal Field]を生成する。潮汐の力場は「潮汐の力」を付与し、1層ごとに会心率が10%上昇する（最大3層）。

support_skill.name: 新潮の裁
support_skill.description: 断潮戟を投擲し、範囲内の敵に攻撃力と防御力に基づくダメージを与える。

resonance_skill.name: 激浪の裁き
resonance_skill.description: ホムラと共に大波を起こし、範囲内の敵を吸い寄せた後、攻撃力と防御力に基づく大ダメージを与える。

ardent_oath.name: 波の永約
ardent_oath.description: ホムラとEvolを共鳴させ、攻撃力と防御力に基づく大ダメージを敵に与える。

passive_skill.name: 漣海の淵
passive_skill.description: 戦闘開始時、ホムラが[海神の印]を付与。重撃で消費され、8秒後に再付与される。[海神の印]は非常に強力で、特に[神の眷属]状態で真価を発揮する。

basic_attack.name: 追波
basic_attack.description: 最大4段の連続攻撃。重撃は強力な斬撃を放ち、[海神の印]が満タンの場合は消費する。ダメージは攻撃力と防御力に依存。

my_passive_skill.name: 帰る波濤
my_passive_skill.description: [海神の印]を消費する重撃は、追加でスキルエネルギーを0.5回復する。

active_skill.name: 減流
active_skill.description: 前方へ突進し、攻撃力と防御力に基づくダメージを与える。
